summary.span: 表示要对数据源执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.

span.span: Provides a base class for database-specific classes that represent commands.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Cancel() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，尝试取消 的执行。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to cancel the execution of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有要取消的内容，则不会执行任何操作。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing happens. 但是，如果有正在执行的命令，则即使取消尝试失败，也不会生成异常。However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取或设置对数据源运行的文本命令。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the text command to run against the data source.

value.span: 要执行的文本命令。

span.span: The text command to execute.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 `StoredProcedure`时，应将 属性设置为存储过程的名称。When you set the to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the name of the stored procedure. 调用 `Execute` 方法之一时，该命令将执行此存储过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the `Execute` methods.

value.span: 等待命令执行所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time in seconds to wait for the command to execute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果分配的 属性值小于0，则将生成 。An is generated if the assigned property value is less than 0. 请注意，对于实现者，建议0表示没有超时。Note to implementers, it is recommended that 0 means no timeout.

summary.span: 异步处置命令对象。

span.span: Asynchronously diposes the command object.
A representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此异步方法的默认实现将委托给其同步对应项，并返回已完成的 `ValueTask`，这可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method delegates to its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed `ValueTask`, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 ExecuteNonQuery() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ExecuteNonQuery () As Integer

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，针对连接对象执行 SQL 语句。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, executes a SQL statement against a connection object.
The number of rows affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 来执行目录操作（例如，查询数据库的结构或创建表等数据库对象），或通过执行 UPDATE、INSERT 或 DELETE 语句来更改数据库中的数据。You can use to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables), or to change the data in a database by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 尽管 不返回任何行，但映射到参数的任何输出参数或返回值都是用数据填充的。Although does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 对于其他所有类型的语句，返回值为 -1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ExecuteScalar() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ExecuteScalar () As Object

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，执行查询，并将查询返回的结果集中第一行的第一列返回。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, executes the query and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

summary.span: 所有其他的列和行将被忽略。

span.span: All other columns and rows are ignored.

returns.span: 结果集中第一行的第一列。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可以从数据库中检索单个值（例如聚合值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database. 这需要比使用 方法更少的代码，并执行使用 返回的数据生成单个值所需的操作。This requires less code than using the method and performing the operations necessary to generate the single value using the data returned by a . 如果找不到结果集中第一行的第一列，则返回空引用（`Nothing` Visual Basic）。If the first column of the first row in the result set is not found, a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) is returned. 如果 `null`数据库中的值，则查询将返回 `DBNull.Value`。If the value in the database is `null`, the query returns `DBNull.Value`.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 的异步版本，执行查询，并将查询返回的结果集中第一行的第一列返回。

span.span: An asynchronous version of , which executes the query and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

summary.span: 所有其他的列和行将被忽略。

span.span: All other columns and rows are ignored.

summary.span: 通过 CancellationToken.None 调用 。

span.span: Invokes with CancellationToken.None.
A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

exception.span: 执行命令文本时出现的一个错误。

span.span: An error occurred while executing the command text.
ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 这是 的异步版本。

span.span: This is the asynchronous version of .

summary.span: 提供程序应使用合适的实现进行重写。

span.span: Providers should override with an appropriate implementation.

summary.span: 可选择性忽略取消标记。

span.span: The cancellation token may optionally be ignored.

summary.span: 默认实现调用同步 方法并返回已完成任务，以便阻止调用线程。

span.span: The default implementation invokes the synchronous method and returns a completed task, blocking the calling thread.

summary.span: 如果传递到已取消的取消标记，则默认实现将返回已取消的任务。

span.span: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellation token.

summary.span: ExecuteScalar 引发的异常将通过返回的任务异常属性传递。

span.span: Exceptions thrown by ExecuteScalar will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.

summary.span: 在返回的任务完成前，不要调用 对象的其他方法和属性。

span.span: Do not invoke other methods and properties of the object until the returned Task is complete.
A task representing the asynchronous operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Prepare() cil managed

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，在数据源上创建准备就绪（或已编译）的命令版本。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 `TableDirect`，则 `Prepare` 不执行任何操作。If the property is set to `TableDirect`, `Prepare` does nothing. 如果 设置为 `StoredProcedure`，则对 `Prepare` 的调用应会成功，但这可能会导致无操作。If is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to `Prepare` should succeed, although it may result in a no-op.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Threading.Tasks.Task PrepareAsync (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = null);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task PrepareAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
abstract member PrepareAsync : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task override this.PrepareAsync : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 用于取消异步操作的可选令牌。

span.span: An optional token to cancel the asynchronous operation.
The default value is .

summary.span: 在数据源上异步创建准备就绪（或已编译）的命令版本。

span.span: Asynchronously creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.
A representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此异步方法的默认实现将委托给其同步对应项，并返回已完成的 `Task`，这可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method delegates to its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed `Task`, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations. 如果 属性设置为 `TableDirect`，则 `PrepareAsync` 不执行任何操作。If the property is set to `TableDirect`, `PrepareAsync` does nothing. 如果 设置为 `StoredProcedure`，则对 `PrepareAsync` 的调用应会成功，但这可能会导致无操作。If is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to `PrepareAsync` should succeed, although it may result in a no-op.
